data.blankContent: In the black comedy Tully (2018), directed by Jason Reitman and written by Diablo Cody, Theron played an overwhelmed mother of three. The ____ was ____ by ____, who ____ that ____ `` delves ____ the ____ parenthood ____ with ____ admirably ____ blend ____ humor ____ raw ____, brought ____ life ____ an ____ performance ____ Charlize Theron ''. She also played the president of a pharmaceutical in the little-seen crime film Gringo and produced the biographical war drama film A Private War, both released in 2018.
data.partBlankContent: In the black comedy Tully (2018), directed by Jason Reitman and written by Diablo Cody, Theron played an overwhelmed mother of three. The fi__ was accl_____ by cri____, who conc_____ that i_ `` delves in__ the mod___ parenthood exper_____ with a_ admirably de__ blend o_ humor a__ raw hon____, brought t_ life b_ an outst______ performance b_ Charlize Theron ''. She also played the president of a pharmaceutical in the little-seen crime film Gringo and produced the biographical war drama film A Private War, both released in 2018.
data.answer: 在由杰森·莱特曼执导、迪亚布罗·科迪编剧的黑色喜剧《徒利》(2018)中，塞隆扮演了一位不知所措的三个孩子的母亲。这部电影受到了影评人的好评，他们总结说，它“以令人钦佩的幽默和率真的巧妙结合，深入探讨了现代为人父母的经历，查理兹·塞隆的出色表演将其带到了生活中”。她还在鲜为人知的犯罪电影《Gringo》中扮演了一家制药公司的总统，并制作了传记战争片《私人战争》，这两部电影都于2018年上映。
